member.name: T:RAGENativeUI.Elements.UIMenuSwitchMenusItem
member.summary: List item that holds an list and allows to easily switch between those menus.
member.remarks: All the s must have the same instance of this and is recommended to use the property to make the menu visible without issues.

member.name: P:RAGENativeUI.Elements.UIMenuSwitchMenusItem.CurrentMenu
member.summary: The currently selected menu. Use this to make the proper menu visible when using this item.

member.name: P:RAGENativeUI.Elements.UIMenuSwitchMenusItem.Index
member.summary: Returns the current selected index.

member.summary: List item, with left/right arrows that switches the current menu depending on the current item. Uses the menus titles as the names in the list.
member.param: Index in the list. If unsure user 0.

member.name: T:RAGENativeUI.MenuPool
member.summary: Helper class that handles all of your Menus. After instatiating it, you will have to add your menu by using the Add method.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.MenuPool.Add(RAGENativeUI.UIMenu)
member.summary: Add your menu to the menu pool.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.MenuPool.Remove(RAGENativeUI.UIMenu)
member.summary: Removes the specified menu from the pool

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.MenuPool.AddSubMenu(RAGENativeUI.UIMenu,System.String)
member.summary: Create and add a submenu to the menu pool. Adds an item with the given text to the menu, creates a corresponding submenu, and binds the submenu to the item. The submenu inherits its title from the menu, and its subtitle from the item text.
member.param: The parent menu to which the submenu must be added.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.MenuPool.RefreshIndex
member.summary: Refresh index of every menu in the pool. Use this after you have finished constructing the entire menu pool.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.MenuPool.ToList
member.summary: Returns all of your menus.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.MenuPool.ProcessControl
member.summary: Processes all of your visible menus' controls.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.MenuPool.ProcessKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Processes all of your visible menus' keys.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.MenuPool.ProcessMouse
member.summary: Processes all of your visible menus' mouses.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.MenuPool.Draw
member.summary: Draws all visible menus.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.MenuPool.IsAnyMenuOpen
member.summary: Checks if any menu is currently visible.
member.returns: true if at least one menu is visible, false if not.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.MenuPool.ProcessMenus
member.summary: Process all of your menus' functions. Call this in a tick event.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.MenuPool.DrawBanners(Rage.GraphicsEventArgs)
member.summary: Draw all of your menus' custom banners.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.MenuPool.DrawBanners(Rage.Graphics)
member.summary: Draw all of your menus' custom banners.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.MenuPool.CloseAllMenus
member.summary: Closes all of your menus.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.MenuPool.ResetMenus(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the index of all lists to 0 and unchecks all the checkboxes from your menus.
member.param: If true the index of all lists will be set to 0.
If true all the checkboxes will be unchecked.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.PauseMenu.MissionLogo.#ctor(Rage.Texture)
member.summary: Create a logo from an external picture.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.PauseMenu.MissionLogo.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a mission logo from a game texture.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.StringMeasurer.MeasureString(System.String)
member.summary: Measures width of a 0.35 scale string.

member.name: T:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu
member.summary: Base class for RAGENativeUI. Calls the next events: OnIndexChange, OnListChanged, OnCheckboxChange, OnItemSelect, OnMenuClose, OnMenuchange.

member.name: E:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.OnIndexChange
member.summary: Called when user presses up or down, changing current selection.

member.name: E:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.OnListChange
member.summary: Called when user presses left or right, changing a list position.

member.name: E:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.OnCheckboxChange
member.summary: Called when user presses enter on a checkbox item.

member.name: E:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.OnItemSelect
member.summary: Called when user selects a simple item.

member.name: E:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.OnMenuClose
member.summary: Called when user closes the menu or goes back in a menu chain.

member.name: E:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.OnMenuChange
member.summary: Called when user either clicks on a binded button or goes back to a parent menu.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Basic Menu constructor.
member.param: Title that appears on the big banner.
Subtitle that appears in capital letters in a small black bar.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Basic Menu constructor with an offset.
member.param: Title that appears on the big banner.
Subtitle that appears in capital letters in a small black bar. Set to "" if you dont want a subtitle.
Point object with X and Y data for offsets. Applied to all menu elements.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Drawing.Point,Rage.Texture)
member.summary: Initialise a menu with a custom texture banner.
member.param: Title that appears on the big banner. Set to "" if you don't want a title.
Subtitle that appears in capital letters in a small black bar. Set to "" if you dont want a subtitle.
Point object with X and Y data for offsets. Applied to all menu elements.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Drawing.Point,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Advanced Menu constructor that allows custom title banner.
member.param: Title that appears on the big banner. Set to "" if you are using a custom banner.
Subtitle that appears in capital letters in a small black bar.
Point object with X and Y data for offsets. Applied to all menu elements.
Sprite library name for the banner.

member.name: P:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.WidthOffset
member.summary: Returns the current width offset.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.SetMenuWidthOffset(System.Int32)
member.summary: Change the menu's width. The width is calculated as DefaultWidth + WidthOffset, so a width offset of 10 would enlarge the menu by 10 pixels.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.DisEnableControls(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enable or disable all controls but the necessary to operate a menu.

member.summary: Enable or disable the instructional buttons.

member.param: UIResRectangle object. Position and size does not matter.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.SetBannerType(Rage.Texture)
member.summary: Set the banner to your own custom texture. Set it to null if you want to restore the banner.

To prevent flickering call it inside a event handler.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.GoUpOverflow
member.summary: Go up the menu if the number of items is more than maximum items on screen.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.GoUp
member.summary: Go up the menu if the number of items is less than or equal to the maximum items on screen.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.GoDownOverflow
member.summary: Go down the menu if the number of items is more than maximum items on screen.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.GoDown

member.summary: Change whether this menu is visible to the user.

member.name: P:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.CurrentSelection
member.summary: Returns the current selected item's index. Change the current selected item to index. Use this after you add or remove items dynamically.

member.name: P:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.IsUsingController
member.summary: Returns false if last input was made with mouse and keyboard, true if it was made with a controller.

member.name: P:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.Title

member.name: P:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.CounterPretext
member.summary: String to pre-attach to the counter string. Useful for color codes.

member.name: P:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.CounterOverride
member.summary:
Gets or sets the text that overrides the counter string.
If null the counter string isn't overrided.
member.value: The text that overrides the counter string.

member.name: P:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.ParentMenu
member.summary: If this is a nested menu, returns the parent menu. You can also set it to a menu so when pressing Back it goes to that menu.

member.name: P:RAGENativeUI.UIMenu.ParentItem
member.summary: If this is a nested menu, returns the item it was binded to.
